contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 12, 1865 D Matlock Contest
Matlock Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
matlock-contest
None
The Rocks, Matlock Sources: The Sheffield & Rotherham Independent (Sheffield, England), Friday, September 15, 1865; pg. 3; Issue 3412. The Derby Mercury (Derby, England), Wednesday, September 6, 1865; Issue 6962.
Also see: http://www.ibew.org.uk/misc4286.htm
"Prizes to the amount of £50, will be given in Money, and a £13 13s. Electo-Plated Cornet, by Besson."
The cornet was won by J. Dodsworth, leader of the Dodsworth's Brass Band, Bradford.
